job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong>ESSENTIAL JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES*<br><br><ul><li> Provide their expertise to a team of Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, and Data Engineers to augment existing services and develop new capabilities at GameStop.</li><li> Contribute to one or more ongoing projects and initiatives.</li><li> Leverage clustering, network, NLP, and other analytical tools to better understand the relationships between customers and products.</li><li> Develop statistical and machine learning models to improve customer facing eCommerce services.</li><li> Contribute to the entire lifecycle of a project to ensure it technologically sound.</li><li> Supporting and/or aiding the development of analytical dashboard and reporting tools and processes<br><br><br></li></ul>MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS, JOB SKILLS, ABILITIES<br><br><ul><li> Accredited bachelor’s degree in computer science, mathematics, or similar field; equivalent work experience may be considered as a substitution. Master’s degree preferred.</li><li> 2+ years of experience as a Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or similar role</li><li> Experienced in querying and working with SQL and NoSQL databases</li><li> Experience developing and evaluating machine/deep learning models.</li><li> Proficient in Python/R programming language</li><li> Experience with cloud service providers like AWS and GCP<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications, Job Skills, Abilities<br><br></u></strong><ul><li> 1+ years of experience working with retail data on analytical projects.</li><li> Experience developing cloud-based data services on cloud service providers like AWS and GCP.</li><li> Ability to work with big data in the form of systems like Hadoop and BigQuery.</li></ul>
